name: shell-escape
description: Escape and stringify an array of arguments to be executed on the shell
author: Martin PANEL <martin@xorax.info> (http://xorax.info)
Dave Eddy <dave@daveeddy.com> (http://www.daveeddy.com)

scripts.test: for f in test/*; do echo "$f"; node "$f" || exit 1; echo; done; echo Passed; exit 0
